item.title: Anaconda Enviromenton C9.Io
item.description: Cloud9 or c9.io is an online integraded development enviroment or as we like to call it an IDE. It provides developers an enviroment on the clould that allows anyone to get started with coding imediately and collaborate with others. And now that Amazon bougt Cloud 9 its
